verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Verse:
The promise of Your coming light
It burns so brightly in my mind
All creation groans and waits
For the dawning of that Day

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Pre Chorus:
You will come riding on the clouds
With justice in Your heart, And a sword upon Your side
All will see the glory of Your name
Fire in Your eyes, You're jealous for Your bride

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Chorus:
He's faithful to the end, faithful to my heart
He's faithful to the end, He will come and marry me.

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Bridge:
Glory to the Righteous One
